pli-tv-bu-vb-sk59:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk59:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū satthapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk59:1.3: “Na satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk59:1.7: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca satthapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
